    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-002-002-001",
    "action": "Elias opens the ancient records in the lighthouse archive, dust motes dancing in the lamplight as he carefully turns brittle pages",
    "intention": "Establish the setting and begin the revelation process",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["The lighthouse contains old records", "The records are very old and fragile"],
    "information_withheld": ["What the records contain", "Why Elias is searching them", "The true nature of his duty"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-002-002-002",
    "action": "The first entries describe routine lighthouse operations, but Elias notices gaps in the dates and cryptic margin notes in different handwriting",
    "intention": "Build suspense through subtle inconsistencies",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["There are unexplained gaps in the records", "Multiple people have written in these books", "Something is being deliberately obscured"],
    "information_withheld": ["What caused the gaps", "Who wrote the margin notes", "What lies beneath the waters"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-002-002-003",
    "action": "Elias finds a section titled 'Deep Water Protocols' with detailed instructions for specific light patterns and timing sequences during certain lunar phases",
    "intention": "Introduce the mysterious protocols that hint at deeper purpose",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["There are special protocols for deep waters", "The lighthouse operations are tied to lunar cycles", "The light patterns have specific meanings"],
    "information_withheld": ["What the protocols are meant to accomplish", "What responds to these signals", "The true purpose of the lighthouse"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-002-002-004",
    "action": "A loose page falls from the binding, revealing a hand-drawn map of the ocean floor with strange symbols marking specific depths and coordinates",
    "intention": "Visual revelation that something significant exists below",
    "pivot": true,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["There is a detailed map of the ocean floor", "Specific locations are marked with unknown symbols", "Previous keepers have studied what lies beneath"],
    "information_withheld": ["What the symbols represent", "What exists at those marked locations", "Why this knowledge was hidden"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-002-002-005",
    "action": "Elias reads an entry describing 'the Sleepers' and how the lighthouse serves as both beacon and ward, keeping ancient things dormant in the deep trenches",
    "intention": "Major revelation about the lighthouse's true purpose",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["Ancient entities called 'the Sleepers' exist in the deep ocean", "The lighthouse serves as a ward to keep them dormant", "Elias's role is not just guidance but containment"],
    "information_withheld": ["What the Sleepers truly are", "What would happen if they awakened", "How long this has been going on"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-002-002-006",
    "action": "A final entry, written in shaking handwriting, warns that the barriers are weakening and describes the previous keeper's growing fear as strange dreams plagued his nights",
    "intention": "Establish immediate danger and personal cost",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The containment is failing", "Previous keepers suffered psychological effects", "The situation is deteriorating"],
    "information_withheld": ["What happened to the previous keeper", "How much time remains", "Whether the process can be reversed"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-002-002-007",
    "action": "Elias closes the records and stares out at the dark ocean, realizing his simple duty as lighthouse keeper masks a far more terrifying responsibility",
    "intention": "Emotional climax as Elias grasps the full weight of his situation",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["Elias now understands his true role", "The ocean holds ancient threats", "His duty is far more complex than he believed"],
    "information_withheld": ["What Elias will do with this knowledge", "Whether he can handle the responsibility", "The immediate consequences of this revelation"]
  }
